modDesc.title: Custom Media Player
modDesc.description: This mod adds an in-game media player to Farming Simulator 25. When activated via the custom radio channel, a small overlay will display the current media playing from Spotify or CriderGPT. The player shows song title, artist, and optionally album art or video. Fully optional and unobtrusive to gameplay. FFA-themed UI.
modDesc.author: Jessie Crider
